text:
="preserve">Joseph John Bugel (March 10, 1940 – June 28, 2020) was an American football coach and college player. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Although he was twice a head coach in the National Football League (NFL). He was one of the great offensive line coaches in NFL history. He was known for coaching Phoenix Cardinals, San Diego Chargers, Oakland Raiders and Washington Redskins.
Bugel died on June 28, 2020 at the age of 80.
